messages.messageBody:
Reply below, just like Uncle Tony likes };->

----- Original Message -----
From: Matthew E. Hoyle
Who ran away and was he French?? That is the bit I don't get.

thanks, Matt


----- Original Message -----
From: "Anthony Bryant" <ajbryant@...>
>
> Did you see "Return of the King"?
>
>
> Tony
> --




Matthew,

I made a totally tongue-in-cheek reference to the thought of learning samurai history by watching 'The Last Samurai' by saying I
was going to go watch 'Return of the King' to learn about medieval history.

Nathan took it from there with a referral to the French likeness to trolls; it was the first creature to flee the melee as the Ring
was melting. Thread is in the archives, and not very far back if you hustle over.

Lizzie
